verse.name: v1b
verse.lines: He is exalted newline The King is exalted on high newline I will praise Him

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: He is exalted newline forever exalted newline and I will praise His name

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: He is the Lord newline Forever His truth shall reign newline Heaven and Earth newline Rejoice in His holy name newline He is exalted newline The King is exalted on high
